name: benny martinez
text: The pizza is definitely different. But not in a bad way, i have seen the negative reports on here and to each there own. But for me? Ill definitely go back.

text: I will never step inside another mountain mikes pizza in my life . As I ordered food my wife went to the restroom. She came out saying there was a Dead baby Rat in the restroom I ask for my money they returned it to me so sad not clean

text:
*Note: Do to this being a public statement, there will be some choice words removed but hopefully you can understand my anger.*

name: Rob B
text: Our family comes here 1-2 times a month. This is our favorite Dine-in pizza joint. Staff is friendly and always gives us a "Large Family" discount. Can't really remember a time I've been disappointed with the service or the food. Not crazy about the prices but we've never left hungry.

name: Jerry Oneal
text: Great pizza and wings, nice people.

name: Valerie Bevington
text: The pizza was great,the inside of the restaurant was AWFUL! All the tables were dirty,there were fruit flies at the soda machine,the bathroom looked like it hadn't been cleaned in a long time!

name: Art3mis Contos
text: Just No- I can't believe I didn't read the reviews before walking in. There is a reason it's empty at lunch time. ‚Ä¶More

name: James Cribari
text: The place was empty.  None of the tables were clean at 5 pm.   and the food is severely overpriced.  $25 for a medium pizza....  add another $3 for delivery plus they expect a tip. For that price  I can get an excellent ribeye steak at ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Davis
text: This restaurant has been disenfranchised from the chain. It is no longer a Mountain Mike's. Beware

name: Jennifer Renfro
text: We read they had buffet on Wednesday night but was told they don't anymore. It didn't have a pleasant smell either so we left.

name: Jen Carrillo
text: Large pizzas, very good. Spacious dining area. Very good sides too.

name: John Jennings
text: The pizza is average - that's the only nice thing to say. Someone in management threatened to take the cost of remaking a pizza out of an employee's check after an online ordering snafu. After the management had the nerve to act like it was ‚Ä¶More

text: Horrible service, owner is rude, place is dirty and disgusting, tables are dirty. Ill never go there again.

text: Mountain Mike?  Really?  You should rename it to mountain Habib.  This place is run by a complete idiot.  After waiting on hold, and them accidentally hanging up, I called back to be put on hold again.  Then the guy on the phone couldn't ‚Ä¶More

text: The worst Mountain Mikes I have ever been.   We had the lunch buffet or should I say the Lack of a lunch buffet.   11:00 buffet finely came out at 11:40.   2 pizzas. And breadsticks.  That is it. ‚Ä¶More

text: The employees at this place are very disrespectful. Service is terrible and very slow, even when there not busy. Not only that but they charged us extra for items such as wings, and drinks they would not offer me a pitcher or bottle for the amount of people in the group I came with. Also all of their tables were dirty.

name: Michael H
text: The pizza is really good. It's just the price to me, they are over priced.

name: David Kemper

name: Doug Anderson
text: Food was okay.  Store was hot inside.  Soft drink dispenser was dirty and left solids in Mt. Dew

name: Linda Kissel
text: Came for lunch and no pizza was made , we were given dirty dishes to eat on. The manager was on the phone and when he hung up he went to the back to make a pizza cause we complained he didn't wash his hands or put gloves on . The restaurant is dirty I would not recommend this location.

name: Matthew Sullivan
text: The internet said this was the closest Mountain Mikes - I ordered and waited. This location called to inform me that the closer one was on Vassar and we cancelled your order, so call them and reorder. Big bonus for MM's would have been to ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Adams
text: Tables where dirty. NO AC on in the place very hot and uncomfortable. Asked about it and was told " it's broken sorry." no soap in the restroom either.

name: Sophie H
text: So I came with my kids to mountain mikes to eat pizza. We decided to eat here and I order a a cup for soda. I usually share with my kids my drink and or get them cups for water.. So I ask for 2 cups for water, they then tell me they don't ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Whatever
text: More pricey than most pizza places, but worth it.  The Genies that work there sure make an excellent pizza!  In fact, I'll say it is the best pizza in Reno.

name: Chris S
text: The pizza here is great, and the manager is a really nice guy! Whenever I go to this location I am happy with the service I receive.

name: Lane Arnold
text: Average pizza and salad bar.

name: Charlielovesss
text: The manager messed up our order and didn't really solve the problem.  About a week later we were going to go shopping then get pizza and he told us if we park there he was going to tow us.  We were his customers!  I'm seriously never going to eat there again.  Who threatens to tow his customers?!

name: Cory Barrett
text: The owners of this place are some class A jerks with terrible phone service. Theyou forgot to put the half topping on and yelled at the poor worker in front of me. People make mistakes come on

text: I order pizza all the time especially having 4 kids but tonight my boyfriend got me to order Mountain Mikes.  It was fricken amazing!!!  Best pizza ever nice and perfectly crispy and got here fast!  You will not be disapointed. :)  DELISH!!  KEEP IT UP PLEASE!!!
